body:
I removed the JSON cloning since it was unnecessary, and added a few convenience methods to SandboxManager that were useful in my testing (and also used them in RecipeRunner since they're useful there as well). I also added a test for the emitter executing handlers in the sandbox to ensure that that works properly.

I _think_ this is ready for review again.
